newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Circus raised to buy.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Circus raised to buy.

text.p: -- Merrill Lynch analyst Naomi Tallish said she raised her long-term rating on Circus Circus Enterprises Inc to buy from accumulate and kept the stock at near-term accumulate.
-- She said she cut her fiscal 1997 earnings per share estimate to $1.65 from $1.70 and her fiscal 1998 view to $2.15 from $2.20.
-- She said she saw 25 percent earnings per share growth over the next three years.
-- She sees construction disruptions lasting through the third quarter and said she was "trying to be conservative."
